title: 3dCRUISEtoAFNI
description: Converts a CRUISE dataset defined by a header in OpenDX format.

input.title: Input file
input.description: Input CRUISE header file in OpenDX format

novolreg.title: Ignore VolReg transformations
novolreg.description: Ignore any Rotate, Volreg, Tagalign, or WarpDrive transformations present in the Surface Volume.

setenv.title: Set Environment Variable
setenv.description: Set environment variable ENVname to be ENVvalue. Quotes are necessary. Example: suma -setenv "'SUMA_BackgroundColor = 1 0 1'"

trace.title: Trace Debugging
trace.description: Turns on In/Out debug and Memory tracing. It's recommended to redirect stdout to a file when using this option.

anyOf.description: Turns on In/Out debug and Memory tracing. It's recommended to redirect stdout to a file when using this option.
